diff_act: 4.display the controller's identity in the lead cab

regen.absent_element: notification to the lead cab when a driver is disconnected from a multi-driver call
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the lead cab and display an alert message when any driver disconnects from the multi-driver call.

label: Functional identity of the automatically added controller shall be displayed in the leading cab.
absence: display the identity of the automatically added controller
